description: Acute grief breakdown triggered by overwhelming sorrow and rapid grief escalation
actor_description: It breaks through me. Tears come in waves and I can't keep my face steady. I'm trying to breathe around the hurt and failing. A sob escapes—raw, involuntary—before I can swallow it back. My chest tightens and releases in shaking pulses.
description_text: {actor} breaks down—tears spilling and shoulders shaking, trying to hide the sound and failing.

alternate_descriptions.auditory: I hear involuntary sobs and wet, uneven breathing.
